title: The Golden Thread - Subarnarekha [1965 - India] Bengali

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056537/


Included among the "1001 Movies You Must See Before You Die" - by Steven Schneider

Set in Calcutta and centred around the young man Ishwar and Sita his sister, who live in a refugee camp together with Abhiram, an orphan. Years later, Abhiram and Sita elope to Calcutta as Ishwar opposes their marriage. When Abhiram dies in an accident Sita is forced into prostitution. Meanwhile, Ishwar contemplates suicide but is dissuaded from doing so by his friend Harprasad who persuades him to sample the life in Calcutta, culminating in a visit to a brothel.
